T09hjatm_pu:572: ayaṃ pradīptaḥ kva samīrasārathiḥ kva cātra rājīvavanatvam īdṛśam /
T09hjatm_pu:573: mahātmanāṃ puṇyabalair adhiṣṭhito viṣadrumo 'py oṣadhivṛkṣatām iyāt // HJm_4.35 //
T09hjatm_pu:574: tataḥ sa mahātmā tasmāt puṇḍarīkād avatīrya praviṣṭaś ca tena saha muninā parṇaśālām /
T09hjatm_pu:575: viditabodhisattvavṛttāntena ca vismitamanasā maghavatā samantād añjanācalanīlajaladharapaṭalapihitadinakaram aciraprabhāprakāśaparipiñjaradigantaram ambaratalam akāri /
T09hjatm_pu:576: tato vavuḥ pracalitavāriśīkarāḥ samantataḥ kuṭajabhidaḥ samīraṇāḥ /

T09hjatm_pu:578: samudgate madhukaraveṇunisvane mṛdaṅgavad dhvanati ca vārinirjhare /

T09hjatm_pu:583: śvasann ayovalayasarūpavigrahaḥ punaḥ punaḥ phaṇam atanod bhujaṅgamaḥ // HJm_4.39 //
T09hjatm_pu:586: dadṛśuḥ pathikāṅganāḥ sphurantīṃ taḍitaṃ vārimuci pravepitākṣyaḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:587: upari dviradasya vāyununnāṃ dhvajabaddhām iva kauṅkumīṃ patākām // HJm_4.41 //
T09hjatm_pu:589: abhavaj jalam āvilaṃ nadīnāṃ taṭajambūphalapātabhinnaphenam // HJm_4.42 //
T09hjatm_pu:590: jambūphalaiḥ śabalitāni sarittaṭāni paśyan bhuvaś ca mṛduśādvalaramyaśobhāḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:591: parṇoṭaje kvaṇati vārikaṇābhighātāt tiṣṭhan saha pramumude sa muniḥ śaśena // HJm_4.43 //
T09hjatm_pu:593: sthānaṃ divyasukhākāṅkṣī kim aindraṃ vijigīṣase // HJm_4.44 //
T09hjatm_pu:595: buddhatvam aham icchāmi prāṇināṃ duḥkhaśāntaye // HJm_4.45 //
T09hjatm_pu:596: sa munis tam uvācātha yadā buddho bhaviṣyasi /
T09hjatm_pu:597: tadā syāṃ tava śiṣyo 'haṃ sa cāsmai pratyapadyata // HJm_4.46 //
T09hjatm_pu:598: tad evaṃ tiryaggato 'py asau bhagavān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran prāṇair api paropakāraṃ kṛtavān iti buddhe bhagavati prasādaparāyaṇair bhavitavyam iti /
T09hjatm_pu:601: ko vismayaṃ na nītaḥ śirasas tyāgena bodhisattvasya /
T09hjatm_pu:602: athavā phalānurūpāḥ prāyo mahatāṃ samārambhāḥ // HJm_5.1 //
T09hjatm_pu:605: kauberyā digvadhvāḥ pramanasā pattralekheva viśvakarmaṇā likhitā vividhajanasaṃbādhā
T09hjatm_pu:607: śrīr iva nagararūpeṇāvasthitā bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī yeyam adhunā takṣaśileti khyātim āgatā /
T09hjatm_pu:608: tasyāṃ ca nītibhujabalaparājitānyarājasāmantaḥ samudra iva saritāṃ sarvasaṃpadām
T09hjatm_pu:611: śriyam aripuranārīpadminīnāṃ harantī sakhijanakumudānāṃ hlādam utpādayantī /
T09hjatm_pu:612: niśi manujapatīndos tasya dehaprabhaiva kṣapitatimirajālā dīpakāryaṃ cakāra // HJm_5.2 //
T09hjatm_pu:613: tasya ca rājño lokottareyam akhilajanavismayakāriṇī pratijñābhūt /
T09hjatm_pu:614: yadi māṃ mṛgayeta kaścid arthī nayane prāṇanibandhanaṃ śiro vā /
T09hjatm_pu:615: bhavabhaṅgakaraṃ padaṃ yiyāsuḥ praṇayacchedam ahaṃ na tasya kuryām // HJm_5.3 //
T09hjatm_pu:616: bodhisattvasya ca daśaśatavasor ivāruṇaḥ satatapuraḥsaro 'mātyagaṇapradhāno mahāprajño mahācandro nāmāmātyo babhūva /
T09hjatm_pu:618: na kadācid abhūtāṃ tau parasparaviyoginau // HJm_5.4 //
T09hjatm_pu:619: atha kadācin mahācandro rātrau nidrāvaśam upagato dagdhapalāśarāśinīlaparuṣacchavibhir
T09hjatm_pu:622: sarudhirapuruṣacarmāvacchāditakaupīnair yātudhānaiḥ svapne tasya nṛpater apahriyamāṇaṃ
T09hjatm_pu:626: svāminaś ca naḥ pratijñā śarīram api yācitenārthine mayā dātavyam iti /
T09hjatm_pu:627: tad yāvat tasya nṛpater na kaścic chiro mṛgayate tāvad anekāni ratnamayāni śirāṃsi śilpibhiḥ kārayāmīti /
T09hjatm_pu:628: tair eva kaṃcic chiroyācakaṃ bahir eva pratipūjya visarjayiṣyāmīti /
T09hjatm_pu:630: kṛtātmā suciraṃ jīvañ jīvayatv akhilaṃ janam // HJm_5.5 //
T09hjatm_pu:631: atha mahācandro 'mātyamukhyaḥ śirāṃsi ratnamayāni kārayitvā bahir eva yācanakajanaṃ vicārayāmāsa kenārtha iti /
T09hjatm_pu:634: bhujaga iva prakṛtiraudro raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma /
T09hjatm_pu:636: candraprabhaḥ kila rājā sarvaṃdadas tad gacchāmi tāvat taṃ rājānaṃ śiroyācanena vyarthapratijñaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
T09hjatm_pu:637: kasya nāmāsti śiraḥpradāne śaktir iti vicintya krameṇa bhadraśilām āyayau /
T09hjatm_pu:641: abhavan kakubhaḥ samantato malināḥ proṣitabhartṛkā iva // HJm_5.7 //
T09hjatm_pu:642: anṛtāv api śākhinām abhūt kusumaṃ pāṇḍupalāśakesaram /
T09hjatm_pu:646: vane 'śnatīnām api komalaṃ tṛṇaṃ kṣaṇād gavāṃ kṣīram agāt parikṣayam /
T09hjatm_pu:647: dhavitradhūto 'pi niveśitāṅgatir makheṣu jajvāla na yajvanāṃ śikhī // HJm_5.10 //
T09hjatm_pu:648: atha vividhāny ajanyāni vilokya bhadraśilānivāsī janaḥ kim idam iti samāśaṅkamānaḥ paryākulatām ājagāma /
T09hjatm_pu:649: ye tu tatra nipuṇatarās te rājño vināśam āsannam utprekṣamāṇās tumulamanaso bhūtvā parasparam evam ūcuḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:650: utpātajanitaṃ kṛcchraṃ mā bhūd asya mahībhujaḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:651: yasyāśritya bhujacchāyāṃ dehinaḥ śerate sukham // HJm_5.11 //
T09hjatm_pu:653: raudrākṣo nāmāyaṃ brāhmaṇo 'sya rājñaḥ śiro yācitum āgatas tan nivāryatāṃ kenacid upāyeneti /
T09hjatm_pu:654: athāmātyas tāni ratnamayāni śirāṃsy ānīya raudrākṣam uvāca /
T09hjatm_pu:655: mahābrāhmaṇa yenārthas tad aham eva te pratipādayāmi /
T09hjatm_pu:656: kiṃ bhavato rājñā dṛṣṭena prayojanam iti //
T09hjatm_pu:657: bhavati tanudhanād apīṣṭalābho yadi puruṣāt kim ato mahādhanena /
T09hjatm_pu:658: yadi gajapadamātrakhātatoyaṃ harati tṛṣaṃ vada sāgareṇa ko 'rthaḥ // HJm_5.12 //
T09hjatm_pu:660: na sthūlakṣīradhārāḥ sitajaladarucaḥ prārthaye gāḥ savatsāḥ kiṃcitkarṇāvadhūtabhramadalinivahān naiva mattadvipendrān /
T09hjatm_pu:661: nālaṃkārān prasannasphuṭakiraṇamaṇīn nāpi vāsoviśeṣān yāce mūrdhānam asmād aham avanibhujaḥ sarvado 'yaṃ kileti // HJm_5.13 //
T09hjatm_pu:663: amūni te ratnamayāni sādho dadāmi bhaktipravaṇaḥ śirāṃsi /
T09hjatm_pu:664: na ced amībhis tava kṛtyam asti madīyam adyaiva śiro gṛhāṇa // HJm_5.14 //
T09hjatm_pu:666: taddhetoḥ sādhanībhūtās te cen nanu kṛtārthatā // HJm_5.15 //
T09hjatm_pu:670: atha candraprabho divyena cakṣuṣā taṃ śiroyācanakaṃ bahir avasthitam ālokya priyasuhṛdam iva pratyudgamya tam amātyamukhyam abhihitavān /
T09hjatm_pu:674: yo bhinatti plavaṃ baddhaṃ kathaṃ sa suhṛd ucyatām // HJm_5.16 //
T09hjatm_pu:676: utsāha eva kartavyo dharmavighno na yujyate // HJm_5.17 //
T09hjatm_pu:677: īdṛśo na bhaved arthī yadi mokṣasya kāraṇam /
T09hjatm_pu:679: ity uktvā khaḍgam ākṛṣya brāhmaṇasyārpayan nṛpaḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:680: mama cchindhi śiro vipra proktavān iti cāvyathaḥ // HJm_5.19 //
T09hjatm_pu:681: kva brāhmaṇaḥ kva hṛdayaṃ karuṇāparokṣaṃ caṇḍālasaṃgatam ivāham anena manye /

T09hjatm_pu:684: nāham amātyasuhṛdbandhujanaparivṛtasya bhavataḥ śaknomi śiraś chettum /
T09hjatm_pu:686: tataḥ sa rājā saśapathaṃ vinivartya taṃ bāṣpasalilapariplutākṣaṃ janasamūhaṃ tena nistriṃśapāṇinā brāhmaṇenānugamyamāno ratnagarbhaṃ nāmodyānam agamat /
T09hjatm_pu:688: apagataśirasaṃ nirīkṣituṃ manujapatiṃ bata ko 'dya śakṣyati /

T09hjatm_pu:690: idam avanibhujā vinādhunā puram atidīnajanaṃ na bhāsyati /

T09hjatm_pu:693: evaṃ vicintya sa samādhibalena dhīmān svāyaṃbhuvīṃ gatim agāt svatanuṃ vihāya // HJm_5.23 //
T09hjatm_pu:694: dhanyaḥ sa eva puruṣaḥ samavāpya saukhyaṃ vṛttaṃ prakāśya jagatīndumarīciśubhram /
T09hjatm_pu:695: prāptām avekṣya suhṛdāṃ mahatīṃ vipattiṃ prāpnoti yaḥ prathamam eva śarīrabhaṅgam // HJm_5.24 //
T09hjatm_pu:696: atha ratnagarbham ākrīḍaṃ praviṣṭe rājani mahān ākrandaśabdo 'ntaḥpure samabhūt /

T09hjatm_pu:704: asya nāma jagadbandhos tvaṃ kaṇṭhe pātayiṣyasi // HJm_5.25 //

T09hjatm_pu:707: atha sa rājā tāḥ pramadavanadevatāḥ sānunayam iti vārayāmāsa /

T09hjatm_pu:709: anumodanayā hi puṇyāptir bhavaty ato 'nyathā kuśalapakṣahānir eva /
T09hjatm_pu:712: iti bodhisattvavacanam ākarṇya tā devatās tataḥ sthānāt pratijagmuḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:713: atha sa rājā praṇidhim evam akarot /
T09hjatm_pu:714: śiraḥpradānāt kuśalaṃ yad asmāc cirāya vismāpitasarvalokāt /

T09hjatm_pu:716: asmin pure bhadraśilābhidhāne śirāṃsi dattāni mayā ca yasmin /
T09hjatm_pu:717: sthāne bhavet tatra mano'bhirāme stūpo mahān dehabhṛtāṃ hitāya // HJm_5.29 //
T09hjatm_pu:719: sa bhujagadyutinā sahasāsinā kamalavan mukhapaṅkajam acchinat // HJm_5.30 //
T09hjatm_pu:720: chinne tataḥ śirasi bhūmipateḥ kṣaṇena nirmuktaphullakusumāśrukaṇānubaddhāḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:721: jaghnuḥ svapallavakarair anilāvadhūtair ātmānam utsukatayeva latātaruṇyaḥ // HJm_5.31 //
T09hjatm_pu:723: tasminn abhūd upavane nalinīvadhūnāṃ vṛndaṃ saśokam iva ṣaṭpadakūjitena // HJm_5.32 //
T09hjatm_pu:724: diṣṭāntaṃ gatavati rājñi rājadhānī niḥśrīkapracurajanākulā na reje /

T09hjatm_pu:728: sa ca brāhmaṇas tatkeśeṣu śiraḥ samavalambya tasmād upavanān nirgantum ārebhe /
T09hjatm_pu:729: tato bhadraśilānivāsī janaḥ śokavaśād evam uvāca /
T09hjatm_pu:730: siṃhāsanasthasya nṛpasya bhṛtyair yad unmukhair dṛṣṭam udīrṇaharṣaiḥ /

T09hjatm_pu:734: kaṇṭhacchedavisārisāndrarudhiravyādigdhavakṣaḥsthalaḥ śyenaiḥ so 'yam adhomukhaiḥ kṣitipatir bhrāmyadbhir ālokyate // HJm_5.36 //
T09hjatm_pu:735: dīnāś citāṃ sumahatīṃ sacivā rudantaḥ karpūracandanaturuṣkavatīṃ vidhāya /

T09hjatm_pu:737: atha tāṃ jvalantīṃ citām ālokya paridevamānaḥ sa janakāya evam avocat/

T09hjatm_pu:740: seyaṃ pātitavāsavadhvajanibhā rājñaḥ śamālambinī lolābhiḥ parimṛśyate hutavahajvālāṅgulībhis tanuḥ // HJm_5.38 //
T09hjatm_pu:741: tad evaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgo 'py askhalitamanasā bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kṛta iti vicintya bodhim icchatānyenāpi tyāgaparāyaṇena sādhunā bhavitavyam iti /
T09hjatm_pu:742: ācakhyau bhagavāṃś cedam arhatām arhatāṃ varaḥ /
T09hjatm_pu:745: amātyaḥ śāriputro 'bhūd devadattaś ca sa dvijaḥ // HJm_5.40 //
T09hjatm_pu:748: strītve 'pi bodhisattvaś chittvā māṃsaṃ dadau nijād dehāt /
T09hjatm_pu:751: vividhopavanaśyāmaparyantā dhanadāyamānavaṇigjanaparipūrṇavipaṇimārgā gāndhāraviṣayatilakabhūtā vibhūṣaṇam iva kṣiter utpalāvatī nāma rājadhānī yeyaṃ puṣkalāvatīty adhunā khyātā /
T09hjatm_pu:752: tasyāṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ prathamayauvanopacīyamānakāntilāvaṇyaśobhā devateva svabhavanasya rūpyāvatī nāma strī babhūva /
T09hjatm_pu:754: ativismayakāriṇī janānāṃ karuṇā mūrtimatīva sā babhāse // HJm_6.2 //
T09hjatm_pu:761: kaṭhinatvam anandhasāṃ jahuḥ pramadānāṃ guravaḥ payodharāḥ // HJm_6.3 //
T09hjatm_pu:763: agaman paridīnacakṣuṣāṃ śithilatvaṃ valayāni yoṣitām // HJm_6.4 //
T09hjatm_pu:766: upalipya mṛdā gṛhāntarālaṃ śiśave paryuṣitaṃ pradāya bhojyam /
T09hjatm_pu:767: gṛhiṇī na tathātmanānutepe gṛhiṇaṃ vīkṣya yathā kṣudhāvasannam // HJm_6.6 //
T09hjatm_pu:769: gṛhiṇīṃ gṛham āgatā vanād gaur adhikaṃ sāśruvilocanāṃ cakāra // HJm_6.7 //
T09hjatm_pu:771: adhikaṃ śithilatvam āgateṣu kṣayam ūdhaḥsu gavāṃ payo jagāma // HJm_6.8 //
T09hjatm_pu:772: ādaśya kiṃcid adharaṃ paridurbalena lāṅgūlamūlam avalambya samākulena /
T09hjatm_pu:773: uccikṣipe katham api prakaṭāsthisaṃdhir gopālakena jaratī surabhiḥ kṛśāṅgī // HJm_6.9 //
T09hjatm_pu:775: jano na tasmin viṣaye vimoktuṃ gṛhān nivāsopahataḥ śaśāka // HJm_6.10 //
T09hjatm_pu:778: ātmasnehagauravād apetatanayasnehāṃ tad evāpatyaṃ jighāṃsantīṃ kāṃcit sairandhrīm apaśyat /
T09hjatm_pu:780: bhagini kim idam atinṛśaṃsaṃ karma kartukāmāsīti /
T09hjatm_pu:782: iyaṃ khalu rūpyāvatī dānaśīlā karuṇāvatī ca /
T09hjatm_pu:783: tato yady aham asyāḥ kathayeyam imaṃ vṛttāntaṃ niyatam eṣā mama kṣutpratīkāraṃ kuryād iti vicintyovāca /
T09hjatm_pu:784: bhagini bāḍham asmi prasavābhivṛddhena kṣudagninā parigataśarīrā /
T09hjatm_pu:785: tad icchāmi putrakam imaṃ bhakṣayitum iti /
T09hjatm_pu:786: sutam apy aurasaṃ nāma dviṣantam iva paśyatām /
T09hjatm_pu:787: ātmasneho hi sattvānāṃ dharmādharmau na paśyati // HJm_6.11 //
T09hjatm_pu:788: atha rūpyāvatī karuṇāpravartitabāṣpāvilalocanotpalā tāṃ striyam iti babhāṣe /
